articles.title: Earth's rotation being affected by melting of ice, climate change, causing longer days: Study - Deccan Herald
articles.content: Benedikt Soja, Professor of Space Geodesy at the Department of Civil, Environmental and Geomatic Engineering at ETH Zurich said, We humans have a greater impact on our planet than we realize. And thi… [+1675 chars]
